t = input()
for tests in xrange(t):
    l = map(int,raw_input().split())
    m = min(l)
    i = l.index(m)
    #print m,i
    if i!=0:
        print str(i)*(m+1)
    else:
        l.remove(m)
        m1= min(l)
        i2 = l.index(m1)+1
        if m1==m:
            print str(i2)*(m+1)
        else:
            print '1'+('0'*(m+1))
